writing-1.title: Describe Your Hometown
writing-1.description: Write a descriptive essay about your hometown

writing-2.title: A Letter to Your Future Self
writing-2.description: Write a letter to yourself 10 years in the future

writing-3.title: My Favorite Holiday
writing-3.description: Tell the story of your favorite holiday or celebration

writing-4.title: The Importance of Education
writing-4.description: Argue why education is important for individuals and society

writing-5.title: A Person Who Inspires Me
writing-5.description: Describe someone who has had a significant impact on your life

writing-6.title: Technology: Friend or Foe?
writing-6.description: Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of modern technology

writing-7.title: A Day I'll Never Forget
writing-7.description: Narrate a memorable experience from your life

writing-8.title: Should School Uniforms be Mandatory?
writing-8.description: Present arguments for and against mandatory school uniforms

writing-9.title: My Dream Career
writing-9.description: Explain your career aspirations and why you chose this path

writing-10.title: Climate Change: Our Responsibility
writing-10.description: Discuss the role of individuals in addressing climate change
